mapper.select:
select
DATE_FORMAT(days,'%Y-%m-%d')
DATE_FORMAT(days,'%Y-%m')
DATE_FORMAT(days,'%Y')
days ,sum(allMoney) allMoney,SUM(usedMoney) usedMoney from res_vipCoupon
where days between DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d')
group by 1 order by days asc

select
DATE_FORMAT(days,'%Y-%m-%d')
DATE_FORMAT(days,'%Y-%m')
DATE_FORMAT(days,'%Y')
days ,sum(oil_score_allmoney) oil_score_allmoney,SUM(oil_reissued_allmoney) oil_reissued_allmoney, sum(oil_order_allmoney) oil_order_allmoney,sum(oil_order_allnum) oil_order_allnum, sum(oil_hfive_allmoney) oil_hfive_allmoney,sum(oil_score_usedmoney) oil_score_usedmoney, sum(oil_reissued_usedmoney) oil_reissued_usedmoney,sum(oil_order_usedmoney) oil_order_usedmoney, sum(oil_order_usednum) oil_order_usednum,sum(oil_hfive_usedmoney) oil_hfive_usedmoney, sum(notoil_score_allmoney) notoil_score_allmoney,sum(notoil_reissued_allmoney) notoil_reissued_allmoney, sum(notoil_order_allmoney) notoil_order_allmoney,sum(notoil_hfive_allmoney) notoil_hfive_allmoney, sum(notoil_score_usedmoney) notoil_score_usedmoney,sum(notoil_reissued_usedmoney) notoil_reissued_usedmoney, sum(notoil_order_usedmoney) notoil_order_usedmoney,sum(notoil_hfive_usedmoney) notoil_hfive_usedmoney from res_vipcouponbb where days between DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d') group by 1 order by days asc
select couponStatus name,couponMoney value from res_vipCouponRate

select
DATE_FORMAT(days,'%Y-%m-%d')
DATE_FORMAT(days,'%Y-%m')
DATE_FORMAT(days,'%Y')
days,sum(oil_score_usedmoney) oil_score_usedmoney, sum(oil_reissued_usedmoney) oil_reissued_usedmoney,sum(oil_order_usedmoney) oil_order_usedmoney, sum(oil_order_usednum) oil_order_usednum,sum(oil_hfive_usedmoney) oil_hfive_usedmoney, sum(notoil_score_usedmoney) notoil_score_usedmoney,sum(notoil_reissued_usedmoney) notoil_reissued_usedmoney, sum(notoil_order_usedmoney) notoil_order_usedmoney,sum(notoil_hfive_usedmoney) notoil_hfive_usedmoney from res_vipcoupon_station
days between DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d')
and station_id in
#{item}
group by 1 order by 1 asc

select
DATE_FORMAT(days,'%Y-%m-%d')
DATE_FORMAT(days,'%Y-%m')
DATE_FORMAT(days,'%Y')
days,station_id stationID,sum(oil_score_usedmoney) oil_score_usedmoney, sum(oil_reissued_usedmoney) oil_reissued_usedmoney,sum(oil_order_usedmoney) oil_order_usedmoney, sum(oil_order_usednum) oil_order_usednum,sum(oil_hfive_usedmoney) oil_hfive_usedmoney, sum(notoil_score_usedmoney) notoil_score_usedmoney,sum(notoil_reissued_usedmoney) notoil_reissued_usedmoney, sum(notoil_order_usedmoney) notoil_order_usedmoney,sum(notoil_hfive_usedmoney) notoil_hfive_usedmoney from res_vipcoupon_station
days between DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d')
and station_id in
#{item}
group by 1,2 order by 2,1 asc

select DATE_FORMAT(days,'%Y-%m-%d')
DATE_FORMAT(days,'%Y-%m')
DATE_FORMAT(days,'%Y') days,oil_allmoney,notoil_allmoney,score_allmoney,oil_usedmoney,notoil_usedmoney, score_usedmoney from res_vipcouponbbb where days between DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d')
group by 1 order by 1 asc

select DATE_FORMAT(days,'%Y-%m-%d')
DATE_FORMAT(days,'%Y-%m')
DATE_FORMAT(days,'%Y') days,discount_allmoney,reduction_allmoney,giving_allmoney,discount_usedmoney,reduction_usedmoney, giving_usedmoney from res_vipcouponbbb_oil
where days between DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d')
group by 1 order by 1 asc

select DATE_FORMAT(days,'%Y-%m-%d')
DATE_FORMAT(days,'%Y-%m')
DATE_FORMAT(days,'%Y') days,discount_allmoney,reduction_allmoney,giving_allmoney,discount_usedmoney,reduction_usedmoney, giving_usedmoney from res_vipcouponbbb_notoil
where days between DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d')
group by 1 order by 1 asc
